I have just setup HyperNEAT with Visual Studio 10 on Windows 7.  I seem to =
have things working OK.  I have installed Python and PyOpenGL to get the Vi=
sualizer running, but when I start the Visualizer I just get a bank blue sc=
reen, not the red black and white squared presented in the manual.

Do you =
have any idea what I might be missing, or what I need to do to get the visu=
alizer operating correctly?
